text: Please for the love of all that is good, improve the link “One of your pages” filtering. You should filter results by the page name AND page url. If I enter the exact URL, as it is, I still have to wade through hundreds of results until I can find the right one, or I think you might never even be able to find it from the URL, if the page name is significantly different? That’s pretty silly.
+1, also, when you try to search a hubdb page, all pages have the same name as the parent = it's impossible to select a single hubdb page if you have thousands of records
